articles.author: Toria Sheffield
articles.title: Scientists Find Largest Dinosaur Footprint Site Ever Found in the U.K. — Here’s Why It’s ‘Exhilarating’ - AOL
articles.description: The footprints date back to about 166 million years ago and appear to belong to two distinct types of dinosaurs
articles.content:
Emma Nicholls/OUMNH
 Dinosaur footprint
Scientists have found the U.K.s largest dinosaur footprint site ever.
The tracks were discovered in a quarry in Oxfordshire about 60 miles northwest of Lond… [+3483 chars]
